__TOC__

This event is a dual purpose event. We will celebrate the release of Ubuntu 10.10 Maverick Meerkat. In addition to this we will also be having a presentation on gift ideas for the FOSS enthusiast. The event will feature a live webcam feed and coincide with the launch parties taking place in Manhattan and Syracuse.
